post_text:
Just a reminder that there WILL BE SCHOOL ON WEDNESDAY, NOVEMBER 22ND.

THIS WILL BE AN EARLY DISMISSAL DAY.
South Campus: 1:00 pm
North Campus: 12:45 pm

**All dismissal changes must be made by 12:00.**

AFTERNOON BUS ROUTES FOR FIRST STUDENT AND EMTA WILL BE 2 HOURS EARLIER THAN YOUR CHILD'S REGULAR DROP OFF TIME.

(ex. regular drop off time: 3:24, early dismissal drop off time: 1:24)

School will resume on Tuesday, November 27th.

Have a nice afternoon and a wonderful, safe Thanksgiving holiday.

post_text:
MRCS Families

There was significant damage from last night's storm on Sterrettania, surrounding neighborhoods, and the South Campus property. As you can see from the pictures the school is inaccessible.

We are hoping this will be cleaned up quickly, but we know there's a lot for the city to take care of due to the storm. We will update our families today with more information regarding tomorrow's school day and the clean up of South Campus. Thank you.

Looking for an inexpensive and fun family day?

The Montessori Carnival takes place today from 11 am to 3 pm at 2910 Sterrettania Road. Come spend the day with your Montessori Friends and bring your relatives and neighborhood friends. Everyone in the community is welcome to enjoy this event.

See you soon!!

post_text:
The 2016 MRCS Carnival

South Campus on Sterrettania Road May 21st from 11 am to 3 pm.
This event is open to the community
Tickets are only $4.00 for under 12 years old. There will lunch and snacks to purchase also. Many fun games, several bounces houses and a DJ will make this a fun day for the entire family.

Looking forward to seeing you there!

post_text:
The weather forecast for the weekend is cold and rainy. Therefore the PTO is cancelling the Junk in your Trunk sale and playground celebration. They plan on rescheduling in the Spring when there is better weather.
In the meantime, our students have been enjoying the new swings at both campuses every day at recess.

Thank you to the PTO for their support of Montessori Regional Charter School.

Stay warm this weekend. :)

post_text:
Congratulations to the MRCS Cross Country Team! Micah, Cole, and Jackson competed in the relay competition at Mercyhurst Prep this weekend and came in first place in the 5th-6th grade boys division!

Micah and Jackson got 10th and 6th place respectively at the Dirt in Your Face Race also this weekend.

Congrats to all our runners this season.

Congrats to all our runners this season.

post_text:
Just a reminder that Picture Day is tomorrow, Tuesday, September 29th. Please send your Lifetouch envelope with your order and payment in with your child tomorrow, or see our website for directions on how to order pictures online.

Also remember, to please try to be to school on time tomorrow as picture taking begins first thing in the morning. If your child is absent tomorrow, we will have a picture retake day coming up soon.

Smiling is contagious !

post_text:
Morning Parents,

Hope everyone is settling into a good routine with the first day's of school behind us.

Make sure you check your kids backpack's this afternoon for a notice from our PTO.

Morning Parents,

post_text:
We hope that you were able to attend the Back to School picnic.

If you were unable to attend, you may pick up your Back to School Packet at MRCS Operations Center at 3750 West 26th Street
Tuesday, August 25th from 11 am to 5 pm
OR
Wednesday, August 26th from 8:30 am to 6:30 pm

It is important to pick up your packet and fill out the Transportation form prior to the first day of school. Students will not be released from School on Thursday if they do not have a transportation form on file.

Remember that all packets are now located at the MRCS offices at 3750 West 26th Street – Right next door from Tires for Less!

Look forward to seeing everyone bright and early on the First Day of School Thursday.

Have a great last few days of summer.
